# Importing libraries:
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

# Converting mean absolute difference data to long format:

```{r}

# Reading in datasets:
abs_diff_df_left <- read.csv('../data/mean_abs_diff_sim_left.csv')
abs_diff_df_right <- read.csv('../data/mean_abs_diff_sim_right.csv')

# Binding conservative and liberal datasets:
abs_diff_df <- rbind(abs_diff_df_left, abs_diff_df_right)

# Converting mean abs diff columns to long format and removing unnecessary columns:
df_long_abs_diff <- abs_diff_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(2,3), names_to='sim_condition', values_to='mean_abs_diff') %>%
  select(-c(ci_empi_lower, ci_empi_upper, ci_random_lower, ci_random_upper))

# Converting confidence interval columns to long format and removing unnecessary columns:
df_long_ci_lower <- abs_diff_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(4,6), names_to='ci_lower_condition', values_to='ci_lower') %>%
  select(-c(threshold, poli_affil, mean_abs_diff_empi, mean_abs_diff_random, ci_empi_upper, ci_random_upper))

df_long_ci_upper <- abs_diff_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(5,7), names_to='ci_upper_condition', values_to='ci_upper') %>%
  select(-c(threshold, poli_affil, mean_abs_diff_empi, mean_abs_diff_random, ci_empi_lower, ci_random_lower))

# Combining avg feel and avg perception variables into one dataframe:
abs_diff_df_long <- cbind(df_long_abs_diff, df_long_ci_lower, df_long_ci_upper)

# Saving results:
write.csv(abs_diff_df_long, '../data/mean_abs_diff_long.csv', row.names=FALSE)
```


# Converting acrophily simulation data to long format:

```{r}
# Read in liberal and conservative datasets:
acroph_libs_df <- read.csv('../data/acrophily_sim_left.csv')
acroph_cons_df <- read.csv('../data/acrophily_sim_right.csv')

# Bind liberal and conservative data:
acroph_df <- rbind(acroph_libs_df, acroph_cons_df)

acroph_df <- acroph_df %>%
  select(-c(orig_rating_ego, orig_rating_peer, homoph_rating_peer, acroph_rating_peer_min, acroph_rating_peer_max))

acroph_df

# Converting mean abs diff columns to long format and removing unnecessary columns:
df_long_probs <- acroph_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=2:5, names_to='sim_condition', values_to='prob_more_extreme') %>%
  select(-c(ci_empi_lower, ci_empi_upper, ci_homoph_lower, ci_homoph_upper,
            ci_acroph_lower_min, ci_acroph_upper_min, ci_acroph_lower_max, ci_acroph_upper_max))

acroph_df

# Converting confidence interval columns to long format and removing unnecessary columns:
df_long_ci_lower <- acroph_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(6, 8, 10, 12), names_to='ci_lower_condition', values_to='ci_lower') %>%
  select(-c(threshold, poli_affil, prob_more_extreme_empi, prob_more_extreme_homoph, prob_more_extreme_acroph_min, prob_more_extreme_acroph_max, ci_empi_upper, ci_homoph_upper, ci_acroph_upper_min, ci_acroph_upper_max))

df_long_ci_upper <- acroph_df %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=c(7, 9, 11, 13), names_to='ci_upper_condition', values_to='ci_upper') %>%
  select(-c(threshold, poli_affil, prob_more_extreme_empi, prob_more_extreme_homoph, prob_more_extreme_acroph_min,
            prob_more_extreme_acroph_max, ci_empi_lower, ci_homoph_lower, ci_acroph_lower_min, ci_acroph_lower_max))

# Combining avg feel and avg perception variables into one dataframe:
acroph_df_long <- cbind(df_long_probs, df_long_ci_lower, df_long_ci_upper)

acroph_df_long

# Save results:
write.csv(acroph_df_long, '../data/acrophily_sim_long.csv', row.names=FALSE)
```


# Combine left/right user coefficient data:
```{r}
# Reading in coefficient data:
coef_cons <- read.csv('../data/user_coef_right.csv')
coef_libs <- read.csv('../data/user_coef_left.csv')

coef_df <- rbind(coef_cons, coef_libs) %>%
  mutate(user_coef = prob_diff / sd(prob_diff)) %>%
  dplyr::select(userid, user_coef, poli_affil)

write.csv(coef_df, '../data/user_coef.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
